Posts.Content: gypsyrambles wrote: I had a sentinel node biopsy. I'd like to have a mastectomy tattoo over my reconstruction. I know any arm tattooing or needles is a big no-no, but how much of a risk is a breast tattoo with only one node removed? I see so many mastectomy tattoo photos that I have to think it can't be that risky. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: mastectomy tattoo and lymphedema risk? gypsyrambles hugz4u
